### Question (b)

```{r}
# data manipulation
base = health %>% 
  filter(time == 1)%>% 
  select(id, health) %>% 
  rename(baseline = health)
# make time 1 as variable baseline
gee_df = sqldf("
      SELECT *
      FROM health
      LEFT JOIN base
      USING(id)
      ") %>% 
  filter(time != 1)
```
